page.title: 19HOCKWORTHY
page.content:
Although Hockworthy is a small village it is an interesting little place. It has a parish church,{Saint Simon {and Saint Jude's}which is in the middle of the village.The village has recently raised 6000 pounds in order to repair the church tower.Amazingly, all of this money was raised in just one weekend. For many years,the Vicars of Hockworthy were always from the Newman family but now this is not so.
Hockworthy used to have a village school which closed in 1950 when the headmistress retired.As there were only a few pupils at the school they were transferred to Holcombe Rogus School and the building was sold to the village for just one pound so that it could be used as the Village Hall.
